sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.FSMManagerMapAJAX</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>FSMManagerMapAJAX</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var FSMManagerMapAJAX = Class.create();
FSMManagerMapAJAX.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	getGroupsList: function() {
		var groupsRecords = new fsmManagerMapUtil().getManagerGroups();
		return new JSON().encode(groupsRecords);
	},
	
	getAgentList: function() {
		var groupSys = this.getParameter('sysparm_group');
		var agentsRecords = new fsmManagerMapUtil().getAgents(groupSys);
		return new JSON().encode(agentsRecords);
	},
	
	getAgentListTest: function() {
		var groupSys = this.getParameter('sysparm_group');
		var agentsRecords = new fsmManagerMapUtil().getAgents(groupSys);
		var result = [{value: 'all', label: gs.getMessage('All')}];
		while(agentsRecords.next()) {
			if (agentsRecords.canRead()) {
				result.push({
					value: agentsRecords.user.sys_id + '',
					label: agentsRecords.user.name + ''
				});
			}
		}
		return new JSON().encode(result);
	},

    type: 'FSMManagerMapAJAX'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2016-10-18 23:44:58</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>0b325bed7fe62200c57212f44efa91f0</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>19</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>FSMManagerMapAJAX</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Field Service Management" source="com.snc.work_management">b66bd6bb4722c210cd4e1ce4316d4387</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_0b325bed7fe62200c57212f44efa91f0</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2016-10-19 02:20:15</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
